org.itsnat.core
Interface ItsNat

All Superinterfaces:
ItsNatUserData
public interface ItsNat
extends ItsNatUserData

Is the root interface of the ItsNat infrastructure. It works as a root factory because almost every ItsNat object is created directed or indirectly using this class.

The feature registry, (getFeature(String) and setFeature(String,Object)) may be used to setup ItsNat. Current implementation does not define any default configurable feature.

Author:
Jose Maria Arranz Santamaria

getFeature

java.lang.Object getFeature(java.lang.String name)
Returns the feature value of given name.

Parameters:
name - the feature name to search.
Returns:
the feature value, null if not found.

setFeature

java.lang.Object setFeature(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.Object value)
Sets the feature value of given name.

Parameters:
name - the feature name.
value - the feature value.
Returns:
the previous feature value if defined or null.

createItsNatServlet

ItsNatServlet createItsNatServlet(javax.servlet.Servlet servlet)
Creates a new ItsNat servlet wrapping the specified servlet object.

Current implementation only supports javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet servlets, and returns ItsNatHttpServlet objects.

Parameters:
servlet - the servlet to wrap.
Returns:
a new ItsNat servlet wrapping the standard servlet.
See Also:
HttpServletWrapper.init(javax.servlet.ServletConfig)
